pkgmetadata.longdescription: Read Mouse Genome Informatics Reports // Provides readers for easy and consistent importing of Mouse Genome Informatics (MGI) report files: https://www.informatics.jax.org/downloads/reports/index.html. These data are provided by Baldarelli RM, Smith CL, Ringwald M, Richardson JE, Bult CJ, Mouse Genome Informatics Group (2024) doi:10.1093/genetics/iyae031.
